headline: Is There Now An Opportunity In Block (SQ) After Recent Share Price Weakness?
summary: If you are wondering whether Block's current share price offers good value, you are not alone; this article walks through what that price might imply about the business. Block's shares last closed at US$70.00, with returns of 6.8% over the past week, 14.5% over the last month, 7.4% year to date, but a 20.2% decline over 1 year and a 69.2% decline over 5 years. Recent market attention on Block has centered on its role in digital payments and broader fintech adoption, which continues to shape...
